function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for inadequate disinfection due to lack of control over the inactivation process and moisture content","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogens surviving disinfection and spreading infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict control measures for inactivation process and moisture content, and evaluate advanced microwave technologies for biotherapeutic product drying","Technologies":"Advanced microwave systems with control measures for inactivation process and moisture content","People":"Individuals in environments reliant on effective disinfection techniques","Owner":"Facility managers, disinfection technology manufacturers"},{"Description":"Misuse of conventional microwave units leading to ineffective disinfection","Impact":"Inadequate killing of microorganisms and increased risk of contamination","Mitigation":"Provide training and guidelines for proper use of microwave units, and consider upgrading to advanced microwave technologies","Technologies":"Training programs for microwave unit operators, advanced microwave technologies","People":"Operators and technicians using conventional microwave units","Owner":"Facility managers, training providers, disinfection technology manufacturers"},{"Description":"Potential environmental pollution and health risks due to improper disposal of biohazardous wastes and toxic residues after disinfection","Impact":"Health hazards, environmental contamination, and spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement proper waste management and disposal procedures, and evaluate advanced microwave technologies with no residues or toxic wastes","Technologies":"Advanced microwave systems with no residues or toxic wastes, proper waste management and disposal protocols","People":"Workers involved in waste management, environmental protection agencies","Owner":"Facility managers, waste management companies, disinfection technology manufacturers"}]}
